Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
GameWorld
public class GameWorld extends greenfoot.World
GameWorld is a room-to-room adventure world driven by a 2D grid of rooms. Door rules: - If the current room is cleared (enemies = 0): all doors are usable. - If not cleared: ONLY the "back door" (the room came from) is usable. - Locked door gaps are physically blocked using invisible Wall objects.

    • act

      public void act()
      - Marks a room cleared when enemies reach 0 - Updates HUD, the side panel - Updates door lock states and physical door blockers
      Overrides:
      act in class greenfoot.World

    • tryMove

      public void tryMove(int dr, int dc)
      Attempts to move to an adjacent room. Rules: - If current room cleared: can move to any neighbor room. - If not cleared: can ONLY move back to the last room.
      Parameters:
      dr - change in room row
      dc - change in room col

    • isRoomUnlocked

      public boolean isRoomUnlocked()
      Returns:
      true if the current room has no enemies
